Package org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.datatransfer.sasl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataEncryptionKeyFactory
    Creates a new DataEncryptionKey on demand.
    SaslDataTransferServer.PasswordFunction
    The SASL handshake for encrypted vs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataTransferSaslUtil
    Utility methods implementing SASL negotiation for DataTransferProtocol.
    SaslDataTransferClient
    Negotiates SASL for DataTransferProtocol on behalf of a client.
    SaslDataTransferClient.SaslClientCallbackHandler
    Sets user name and password when asked by the client-side SASL object.
    SaslDataTransferServer
    Negotiates SASL for DataTransferProtocol on behalf of a server.
    SaslDataTransferServer.SaslServerCallbackHandler
    Sets user name and password when asked by the server-side SASL object.
    SaslParticipant
    Strongly inspired by Thrift's TSaslTransport class.
    SaslResponseWithNegotiatedCipherOption  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMagicNumberException
    Indicates that SASL protocol negotiation expected to read a pre-defined magic number, but the expected value was not seen.
